description: RTL layout rules for Hebrew/Arabic projects

terminology.START: Beginning of reading direction (RIGHT in RTL, LEFT in LTR)
terminology.END: End of reading direction (LEFT in RTL, RIGHT in LTR)

rules.title: RTL Must Propagate to ALL Children
rules.description: Inner flex containers may not inherit dir='rtl'
rules.fix: Add dir='rtl' to inner flex containers explicitly

rules.title: Text Alignment in RTL
rules: Use items-end for flex column alignment in RTL

rules.title: Button Icons - Use END for trailing icons
rules.description: Icons typically go at END (after text in reading order)
rules.rtl: Use rightIcon for icon at END (LEFT in RTL)

rules.title: Prices need dir='ltr'
rules.description: Wrap prices in <span dir='ltr'> to prevent symbol reversal

rules.title: justify-end Pushes to LEFT in RTL
rules.description: Remove justify-end for natural RTL flow from RIGHT
